name: Derro, Abysswalker
description: The Derro, Abysswalker is a small humanoid with a cunning and dangerous demeanor, sporting enhanced Dexterity and Constitution.
memorable: It excels in using poison against enemies and has immunity to poison damage, making it a treacherous foe.
goals: Typically seeks to engage in chaotic and dangerous confrontations, leveraging its abilities to manipulate battles.
relations: Often encountered alongside other derro or malevolent creatures of the Abyss.
environment: Primarily found in dark, chaotic areas conducive to its poisonous abilities.
strengths: Immune to poison and resistant to cold, fire, and lightning damage.
weaknesses: Suffers from Sunlight Sensitivity, leading to disadvantage on attacks and Perception checks in sunlight.
attacks: Utilizes multiattacks with a combination of Bite, Claw, and Scimitar, delivering significant damage both physically and with poison.
most_powerful_ability: Poisonous Vapors creates a hazardous area around it, dealing poison damage and poisoning any close proximity foes.
senses: Has darkvision up to 120 feet, allowing it to see in complete darkness.
skills: Possesses poor perception skills with a modifier of -2.
additional_information: Advantage on saves against being charmed or frightened due to its Insanity ability.
Can grapple Medium or smaller creatures with its Claw attack.
Allows for strategic positioning in battles with its area denial from Poisonous Vapors.
test_queries: small malicious humanoid with poison abilities
poisonous vapors dangerous close combat opponent
cunning humanoid that thrives in darkness
derro monster with sunlight sensitivity weaknesses
